Apttus_CQApprov__Approval_Status__c.HelpText: The approval status of the cart line item

Apttus_Config2__UnitPriceAdjustmentManua.HelpText: The manual unit adjustment for the product or service applied to the base price

Apttus_Config2__UnitPriceAdjustmentAuto_.HelpText: The automatic unit adjustment for the product or service applied to the base price

Apttus_Config2__UnitCostAdjustment__c.Label: Unit Cost Adjustment
Apttus_Config2__UnitCostAdjustment__c.HelpText: The unit adjustment for the product or service applied to the base cost

Apttus_Config2__TransferPriceLineItemId_.Label: Transfer Price Line Item
Apttus_Config2__TransferPriceLineItemId_.HelpText: Line Item from collaborators cart from which transfer prices was received for this line item

Apttus_Config2__StatusDetails__c.Label: Status Details
Apttus_Config2__StatusDetails__c.HelpText: Maintains information about what is pending

Apttus_Config2__ServiceLocationId__c.Label: Service Location
Apttus_Config2__ServiceLocationId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated service location

Apttus_Config2__SellingUom__c.Label: Selling Uom
Apttus_Config2__SellingUom__c.HelpText: The selling unit of measure for the product

Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItemId__c.Label: Order Line Item
Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItemId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated order line item

Apttus_Config2__IsOptional__c.Label: Is Optional
Apttus_Config2__IsOptional__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item is optional

Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.Label: Delta Quantity
Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.HelpText: The change in quantity for the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.Label: Delta Price
Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.HelpText: The change to the net price of the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__CollaborationParentLineN.Label: Collaboration Parent Line Number
Apttus_Config2__CollaborationParentLineN.HelpText: Line number of the collaborated line item from parent configuration

Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.Label: Taxable ?
Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item is taxable

Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.Label: Tax Inclusive ?
Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the price is tax inclusive. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.Label: Tax Code
Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.HelpText: ID of the tax code associated with the line item. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__ShipToAccountId__c.Label: Ship To
Apttus_Config2__ShipToAccountId__c.HelpText: ID of the ship to account

Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.Label: Payment Term
Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.HelpText: ID of the payment term associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.Label: Net Unit Price
Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.HelpText: The net unit price for the product or service is the Unit Adjusted Price after applying the Group Adjustment %

Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.Label: Max Usage Quantity
Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.HelpText: The maximum usage quantity. Only applicable to usage items.

Apttus_Config2__LineSequence__c.Label: Line Sequence
Apttus_Config2__LineSequence__c.HelpText: Sequence a logical line using this sequence.

Apttus_Config2__IncentiveExtendedPrice__.Label: Incentive Extended Price
Apttus_Config2__IncentiveExtendedPrice__.HelpText: The incentive extended price is Quantity X Incentive Base Price X Term (if applicable) for individual products and options

Apttus_Config2__IncentiveCode__c.Label: Incentive Code
Apttus_Config2__IncentiveCode__c.HelpText: The incentive code available to customers to identify the incentive

Apttus_Config2__IncentiveBasePrice__c.Label: Incentive Base Price
Apttus_Config2__IncentiveBasePrice__c.HelpText: The incentive base price is Base price + Incentive Adjustments for individual products and options

Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.Label: Hide Invoice Display
Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the item would be hidden in the invoice display.

Apttus_Config2__HideCopyAction__c.Label: Hide Copy Action
Apttus_Config2__HideCopyAction__c.HelpText: Check to hide copy action for the line item

Apttus_Config2__HasIncentives__c.Label: Has Incentives
Apttus_Config2__HasIncentives__c.HelpText: Indicates whether there are one or more incentives associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.Label: Charge Group
Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.HelpText: ID of the charge group to which this charge type is associated

Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.Label: Billing Rule
Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.HelpText: The billing rule associated with the price item

Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.Label: Billing Preference
Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated billing preference

Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.Label: Billing Frequency
Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.HelpText: The billing frequency associated with the recurring or usage price

Apttus_Config2__BillToAccountId__c.Label: Bill To
Apttus_Config2__BillToAccountId__c.HelpText: ID of the bill to account

Apttus_Config2__AutoRenew__c.Label: Auto Renew
Apttus_Config2__AutoRenew__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the recurring item would auto renew at end of term

Apttus_Config2__TotalQuantity__c.Label: Total Quantity
Apttus_Config2__TotalQuantity__c.HelpText: The total quantity is Quantity + Asset Quantity

Apttus_Config2__HasTieredPrice__c.Label: Has Tiered Price
Apttus_Config2__HasTieredPrice__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item has a tiered price.

Apttus_Config2__RollupPriceMethod__c.Label: Rollup Price Method
Apttus_Config2__RollupPriceMethod__c.HelpText: The rollup price method.Only applicable to Option line types.

Apttus_Config2__PricingGuidance__c.Label: Pricing Guidance
Apttus_Config2__PricingGuidance__c.HelpText: The pricing guidance associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__PriceGroup__c.Label: Price Group
Apttus_Config2__PriceGroup__c.HelpText: The price group associated with the product or option

Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.Label: Parent Bundle Number
Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.HelpText: Represents the parent bundle number associated with the child bundle

Apttus_Config2__OptionPrice__c.Label: Option Price
Apttus_Config2__OptionPrice__c.HelpText: The rolled up adjusted price of options for each unit of the bundle product

Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.Label: Is Usage Tier Modifiable
Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the usage price tier is modifiable for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsSellingTermReadOnly__c.Label: Is Selling Term Read Only
Apttus_Config2__IsSellingTermReadOnly__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the selling term is modifiable for the recurring product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.Label: Is Primary Ramp Line
Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line is the primary line for the price ramp. Only applicable when price ramp is in effect for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsAssetPricing__c.Label: Is Asset Pricing
Apttus_Config2__IsAssetPricing__c.HelpText: Indicates whether asset pricing is in effect for the line item

Apttus_Config2__Guidance__c.Label: Guidance
Apttus_Config2__Guidance__c.HelpText: The pricing guidance associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__FlatOptionPrice__c.Label: Flat Option Price
Apttus_Config2__FlatOptionPrice__c.HelpText: The rolled up adjusted flat price of options for the bundle product

Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c.Label: Extended Quantity
Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c.HelpText: The extended quantity is Quantity X Parent Quantity)

Apttus_Config2__CopySourceNumber__c.Label: Copy Source Number
Apttus_Config2__CopySourceNumber__c.HelpText: The Primary Line Number of the line item the current line was copied from

Apttus_Config2__CopySourceBundleNumber__.Label: Copy Source Bundle Number
Apttus_Config2__CopySourceBundleNumber__.HelpText: The bundle number from which the current line was copied from

Apttus_Config2__CommitmentQuantity__c.Label: Commitment Quantity
Apttus_Config2__CommitmentQuantity__c.HelpText: The quantity commitment associated with the product or option

Apttus_Config2__BasePriceOverride__c.Label: Base Price (Override)
Apttus_Config2__BasePriceOverride__c.HelpText: The base price overridden by the user

Apttus_Config2__BaseCostOverride__c.Label: Base Cost (Override)
Apttus_Config2__BaseCostOverride__c.HelpText: The base cost overridden by the user

Apttus_Config2__AssetId__c.Label: Asset
Apttus_Config2__AssetId__c.HelpText: ID of the asset associated with the line item

HotSOS_Non_PMS_API_Integration__c.HelpText: For each Non-PMS API Integration select the corresponding values so that each will pull separately. Ex. if you are selling three integrations you would choose; First Integration, Second Integration, and Third Integration. The Setup fee will also pull.

HotSOS_PMS_Interface__c.HelpText: Select this checkbox if you are selling a PMS Interface to be included with a bundle as it will pull the PMS Setup fee as well

Activation_Only__c.Label: Activation with Delphi Only
Activation_Only__c.HelpText: The activation is with Delphi only.

Apttus_Config2__IsTransient__c.Label: Is Transient
Apttus_Config2__IsTransient__c.HelpText: Indicates a transient record created by the application with default values. A new product attribute value is in transient state until the record is explicitly saved by the user.

Apttus_Config2__SuspensionStartDate__c.Label: Suspension Start Date
Apttus_Config2__SuspensionStartDate__c.HelpText: The date when the asset line item was suspended.

Apttus_Config2__SuspensionEndDate__c.Label: Suspension End Date
Apttus_Config2__SuspensionEndDate__c.HelpText: The date when the asset line item may resume after a suspension.

Apttus_Config2__RemainingBillableAmount_.Label: Remaining Billable Amount
Apttus_Config2__RemainingBillableAmount_.HelpText: Indicates how much is remaining to be be billed for the asset. The field will be updated every time the “Status” of a Billing Schedule changes from “Pending Billing” to “Invoiced” and vice versa.

Apttus_Config2__IsLegacyForBilling__c.Label: Is Legacy For Billing
Apttus_Config2__IsLegacyForBilling__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset is considered as Legacy for Billing

Apttus_Config2__FirstBillingDate__c.Label: First Billing Date
Apttus_Config2__FirstBillingDate__c.HelpText: The first day of billing for the asset. Primarily used for the legacy assets.

Apttus_Config2__BillingTerm__c.Label: Billing Term
Apttus_Config2__BillingTerm__c.HelpText: The billing term associated with the product or service

Apttus_Config2__TotalQuantity__c.Label: Total Quantity
Apttus_Config2__TotalQuantity__c.HelpText: The total quantity of product across various instances or purchase identifiers

Apttus_Config2__RenewalLineItemId__c.Label: Renewal Line Item
Apttus_Config2__RenewalLineItemId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated renewal line item

Apttus_Config2__PurchaseId__c.Label: Purchase Identifier
Apttus_Config2__PurchaseId__c.HelpText: The purchase identifier associated with the asset

Apttus_Config2__LegalEntityId__c.Label: Legal Entity
Apttus_Config2__LegalEntityId__c.HelpText: ID of the legal entity associated with the asset. This will be used for downstream billing and revenue functions.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractValue__c.Label: Current Contract Value
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractValue__c.HelpText: The value of the current contract as determined for the current contract term during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractUnitPrice.Label: Current Contract Unit Price
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractUnitPrice.HelpText: The value of the current contract unit price for the product or service determined for the current contract term during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractTerm__c.Label: Current Contract Term
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractTerm__c.HelpText: The term of the current contract period as determined during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractStartDate.Label: Current Contract Start Date
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractStartDate.HelpText: The start date of the current contract term as determined during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_CMConfig__AgreementLineItemId__c.Label: Agreement Line Item
Apttus_CMConfig__AgreementLineItemId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated agreement line item

Apttus_Config2__TotalBalance__c.Label: Total Balance
Apttus_Config2__TotalBalance__c.HelpText: The amount added to the asset till date

Apttus_Config2__SellingUom__c.Label: Selling Uom
Apttus_Config2__SellingUom__c.HelpText: The selling unit of measure for the product

Apttus_Config2__PrimaryLineNumber__c.Label: Primary Line Number
Apttus_Config2__PrimaryLineNumber__c.HelpText: Represents the unique number for each primary line item

Apttus_Config2__ParentAssetId__c.Label: Parent Asset Line Item
Apttus_Config2__ParentAssetId__c.HelpText: The ID of the direct parent asset.

Apttus_Config2__NextRenewEndDate__c.Label: Next Renew End Date
Apttus_Config2__NextRenewEndDate__c.HelpText: The next renew end date for the asset line item

Apttus_Config2__LastRenewEndDate__c.Label: Last Renew End Date
Apttus_Config2__LastRenewEndDate__c.HelpText: The last renew end date for the asset line item

Apttus_Config2__IsRenewed__c.Label: Is Renewed
Apttus_Config2__IsRenewed__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset line item is renewed

Apttus_Config2__IsRenewalPending__c.Label: Is Renewal Pending
Apttus_Config2__IsRenewalPending__c.HelpText: Indicates whether renewal is pending for the asset line item

Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryService__c.Label: Is Primary Service
Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryService__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the service is primary or not.

Apttus_Config2__BillingDayOfMonth__c.Label: Billing Day Of Month
Apttus_Config2__BillingDayOfMonth__c.HelpText: The billing day of month. Specific Day of Month, End of Month, etc

Apttus_Config2__AvailableBalance__c.Label: Available Balance
Apttus_Config2__AvailableBalance__c.HelpText: The balance currently available for consumption post additions and deductions

Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalLineItemId__c.Label: Quote Line Item
Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalLineItemId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated quote/proposal line item

Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.Label: Taxable ?
Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item is taxable

Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.Label: Tax Inclusive ?
Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the price is tax inclusive. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.Label: Tax Code
Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.HelpText: ID of the tax code associated with the line item. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.Label: Payment Term
Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.HelpText: ID of the payment term associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__OriginalStartDate__c.Label: Original Start Date
Apttus_Config2__OriginalStartDate__c.HelpText: The original start date associated with the asset

Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.Label: Net Unit Price
Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.HelpText: The net unit price for the product or service is the Unit Adjusted Price after applying the Group Adjustment %

Apttus_Config2__MinUsageQuantity__c.Label: Min Usage Quantity
Apttus_Config2__MinUsageQuantity__c.HelpText: The minimum usage quantity. Only applicable to usage items.

Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.Label: Max Usage Quantity
Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.HelpText: The maximum usage quantity. Only applicable to usage items.

Apttus_Config2__InitialActivationDate__c.Label: Initial Activation Date
Apttus_Config2__InitialActivationDate__c.HelpText: The initial activation date from the ready for activation on the first creation order.

Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.Label: Hide Invoice Display
Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the item would be hidden in the invoice display.

Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.Label: Delta Quantity
Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.HelpText: The change in quantity for the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.Label: Delta Price
Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.HelpText: The change to the net price of the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.Label: Charge Group
Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.HelpText: ID of the charge group to which this charge type is associated

Apttus_Config2__CancelledDate__c.Label: Cancelled Date
Apttus_Config2__CancelledDate__c.HelpText: The date when the asset line item was cancelled

Apttus_Config2__BillingStartDate__c.Label: Billing Start Date
Apttus_Config2__BillingStartDate__c.HelpText: The billing start date. Also known as the first billing period end date.

Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.Label: Billing Rule
Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.HelpText: The billing rule associated with the price item

Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.Label: Billing Preference
Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated billing preference

Apttus_Config2__BillingPlanId__c.Label: Billing Plan
Apttus_Config2__BillingPlanId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated billing plan

Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.Label: Billing Frequency
Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.HelpText: The billing frequency associated with the recurring or usage price

Apttus_Config2__BillingEndDate__c.Label: Billing End Date
Apttus_Config2__BillingEndDate__c.HelpText: The billing end date. Also known as the last billing period end date.

Apttus_Config2__BillThroughDate__c.Label: Bill Through Date
Apttus_Config2__BillThroughDate__c.HelpText: The last billing period date through which invoice has been generated

Apttus_Config2__AutoRenew__c.Label: Auto Renew
Apttus_Config2__AutoRenew__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset is set to auto renew

Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__c.Label: Attribute Value
Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated product attribute value

Apttus_Config2__AssetTCV__c.Label: Asset TCV
Apttus_Config2__AssetTCV__c.HelpText: The total contract value of the asset over its lifetime

Apttus_Config2__AssetMRR__c.Label: Asset MRR
Apttus_Config2__AssetMRR__c.HelpText: The average monthly recurring revenue from the asset over its lifetime

Apttus_Config2__AssetARR__c.Label: Asset ARR
Apttus_Config2__AssetARR__c.HelpText: The average annual recurring revenue from the asset over its lifetime.

Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.Label: Parent Bundle Number
Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.HelpText: Represents the parent bundle number associated with the child bundle

Apttus_Config2__Term__c.Label: Pricing Term
Apttus_Config2__Term__c.HelpText: The pricing term associated with the product or service

Apttus_Config2__PriceUom__c.Label: Pricing Uom
Apttus_Config2__PriceUom__c.HelpText: The pricing unit of measure for the product

Apttus_Config2__LocationId__c.Label: Location
Apttus_Config2__LocationId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated account location

Apttus_Config2__IsReadOnly__c.Label: Is Read Only
Apttus_Config2__IsReadOnly__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset line item is modifiable

Apttus_Config2__IsInactive__c.Label: Inactive
Apttus_Config2__IsInactive__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset is inactive.

Apttus_Config2__MustUpgrade__c.Label: Must Upgrade
Apttus_Config2__MustUpgrade__c.HelpText: Whether the product requires upgrade during renewal.

Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.Label: Is Usage Tier Modifiable
Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the usage price tier is modifiable for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.Label: Is Primary Ramp Line
Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line is the primary line for the price ramp. Only applicable when price ramp is in effect for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__BusinessLineItemId__c.Label: Business Line Item
Apttus_Config2__BusinessLineItemId__c.HelpText: Line Item Id  of the business object like agreement line item or proposal line item.

Apttus_Config2__BundleAssetId__c.Label: Bundle Asset Line Item
Apttus_Config2__BundleAssetId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated bundle line item.
